text:
Created attachment 30904
Fix for this ticket

The final steps in the build process of APR 2 fail on Windows.
The problem happens because the @EXEEXT@ variable is not applied to all points to tools/gen_test_char
The patch attached here fixes the bug.

Sincerely,

Carlo Bramini.
creator: carlo.bramix@libero.it
